Do more with YOUtilities

Several day-to-day utilities made with love just for you.

We've got some great utilities to help front-end developers, graphic designers and even the general audience all at one place!

So what is it really ?

YOUtilities is an open source project managing website that consists of several smaller comprehensive projects that make up the utilities available on the website. Every project is either made with React.js or Vanilla EcmaScript6. The utilities vary from web-apps that are mostly used by front-end developers and graphic designers like the Better-ipsum and Tints 'n Shades to fun and informative apps for the general audience like HeadStories and Brainemy. We also have daily use apps for everyone i.e. Dark Doodle and getPass that could actually save time instead of hopping through websites just to get some small work done.

<Sourcecode>

Our Utilities

Tints 'n Shades

Tints 'n Shades is web-app that allows front-end developers and graphic designers to pick 10 highlighted and shadowed versions of a colour they input. Its really effective when making hover and click effects of an html element.

<Sourcecode>
Use Utility

Better-ipsum

Better-ipsum is a random text generator web-app that generates dummy text similar to the infamous lorem-ipsum. It's better than regular lorem-ipsum because the text it generates looks a lot realistic to actual english written text and not random latin strings which are hard to understand.

<Sourcecode>
Use Utility

HeadStories

HeadStories is not necessarily a news app. It's much more. It can let the user know all the major headlines that were published throughout the history related to that particular topic. It's not a web-app that somebody would use daily but can come in handy when needed.

<Sourcecode>
Use Utility

Dark Doodle

Dark doodle is exactly what it says. A dark themed drawing web-app that keeps the extra whites off your eyes so that you draw but with comfort. It comes in handy when you want to make people visualize a certain thing through a rough diagram of sorts but dont have a pen and paper lying around. Moreover its much easier to send a screenshot rather than clicking an image.

<Sourcecode>
Use Utility

getPass

getPass is a utility that allows you to generate a random password with preferences of your choice. You can just choose what ASCII characters you want in the password and press generate. You can click copy button to directly copy the password onto your clipboard.

<Sourcecode>
Use Utility

Brainemy

Brainemy is a great quiz web-app. Feeling down? Just go take a quiz about your favourite topic on Brainemy and feel great about yourself. But beware. There's a reason it's named Brainemy. Your brain's enemy. You can challenge your friends to take a brainemy quiz and boast about your knowledge, that is... IF you managed to score great.

<Sourcecode>
Use Utility
